events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position in our backend team.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to manage the candidate's application process.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening call, demonstrating strong knowledge in backend development.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening questions, expressing enthusiasm for the role.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess their advanced software engineering skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities and coding skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's work preferences and cultural fit within the company.
The HR interview was completed positively; the candidate expressed alignment with company values and role expectations.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, including competitive salary and benefits aligned with their experience.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and indicated their eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed their start date for onboarding.
The onboarding process has begun for the new software engineer, including orientation and setup of development tools.
The recruitment process has been successfully completed; the candidate is now officially hired into the engineering team.
